channel.title: Know your inner self and see the universe!
channel.description: Know your inner self and see the universe!

item.title: Learn to Meditate - Meditation Classes & Retreats | American Meditation Society
item.description:
Learn to Meditate - Meditation Classes & Retreats | American Meditation Society

Meditation Designed for the Individual The American Meditation Society is a non-profit educational organization dedicated to providing meditation classes and meditation techniques that are personalized. A range of instruction is available including meditation for beginners to advanced practices that are designed for the individual. Meditation when properly taught is effortless and opens the heart.

item.title: Joe Charsagua Yoga & Meditation -- "Yoga for Your Life"
item.description:
Joe Charsagua Yoga & Meditation -- "Yoga for Your Life"

A place for thoughts on Yoga and Meditation and a life journey with them.
